name: Weeping Gemini
desc: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Though it's made from scrapped parts, it still caused some distress among Bangboo lovers. "No Bangboo were hurt during the production of this W-Engine." â€” the manufacturer had to include this note on the packaging due to protests from Bangboo rights organizations.
desc2: Equip to increase Anomaly Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Its electrode cores made of recycled metals can release high-voltage charges.
phaseDescs: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the equipper gains a buff that increases Anomaly Proficiency by <ct color=#2BAD00>30</ct>, stacking up to 4 times. This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

This effect expires when the target recovers from Stun or is defeated. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
